content: the bambi scarf about this project- this is part of a series of hats and scarves dedicated to very special women and girls who are very dear to me dedication to bambi- she is always willing to sacrifice for the ones she loves crochet level- intermediate to advanced uses short row and slip stitches materials needed hook size j or 6mm yarn worsted weight #4 or dk wt #3 about 375 400 yards note yarn used in sample is red heart supersaver yarn needle stitch markers optional gauge- is not crucial for this project and will vary depending on weight of yarn used sonja otto © 2025 stitch abbreviations used in this pattern bl- back loop cont- continue chain- chain cslst- combined slip_stitch half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet lcslst- long combined slip_stitch single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch st- stitch the bambi scarf page 1 of 10 directions notes this pattern is worked using short row and will be worked in sections and row you can make your scarf as long or short as you would like chain a multiple of 8 plus one so that your chain is long enough to be a scarf notes sample was made with 201 chains as 25 times 8 is 200 then add one and it is 201 chains use stitch markers to help you count your chain section 1 notes the odd row are the right side of your work row 1 working in back bump of chain and 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch cont to slip_stitch across chain note when working your slip_stitch make sure your stitches don t get too tight keep a relaxed hand special note for the remainder of the pattern we will be working in the back loops row 2 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in first st slip_stitch in next 3 st leaving rest of row unworked 4 slip_stitch row 3 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in first st single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in last 2 st 4 stitches worked photo below- row 1-3 of section 1 the bambi scarf page 2 of 10 row 4 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in first st slip_stitch in next 3 st work a cslst see photo tutorial below slip_stitch in next 3 st leave rest of row unworked 8 st worked special stitch cslst- insert hook in bump see photo with arrow 2nd photo at right hook inserted in bump now working in next st from row 1 insert hook in bl see very bottom photo at left 2nd photo at very bottom right you will have 3 loops on hook yarn over and pull through all 3 loops one cslst made photo of section 1 row 1-4 completed the bambi scarf page 3 of 10 section 1 row 5 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in first st single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 4 st single_crochet in next st slip_stitch in last st 8 st worked row 6 chain 1 turn working
